ooow yeah, downloading @ 6 kb/s really nice...

Hello everyone...

After settings, a game freeze on the loading screen. 
Because missing some cudart32dllfuckingshit!

Don't worry, i'm experimenter type:)
So... download a missing dll, from here:

http://www.dllme.com/dll/download/6490/cudart32_30_9.dll

No fear, no pay, no fuckin' bullshit, just download, and put a game directory.
No problemo, everything fine, and working.

Sorry my language, i'm hun.
